channel.title: [Project Zeta]How to use/open Project Zeta ~ Video's UP! ~
channel.description:
[quote="RandQm, post:1, topic:453305"][center][img]http://i.imgur.com/HENBR.png[/img] [b][size=24pt]Introduction:[/size][/b] [b]I once started a project with the eye on improving delta, many months later, there has been so much changed that it just can't be called a delta anymore. Apart from the main design everything has been rewritten from scratch. I'm still working on this project, but I decided to make a small project and release it to the public. The idea for this server was using my own base for the biggest part, keeping it as noobfriendly as possible and keeping it clean, ready to be made a good server from. For this release I tried to bring back oldschool rsps skilling, which wasn't hard since everything was so basic.[/b] [/center] [b][size=18pt]Project Zeta:[/size][/b] [ul][li]Packaged[/li] [li]Everything extremely organized[/li] [li]A lot of information blocks[/li] [li]Cleaned from all unnused content[/li] [li]Nutrition (pots & food)[/li] [li]Basic npc clipping[/li] [li]Worldwide all pickables[/li] [li]Boat traveling system[/li] [li]New shop adding system from scratch; extremely easy usage[/li] [li]New stair handling system from scratch; extremely easy usage[/li] [li]New unique dialogue handling system from scratch; extremely easy usage[/li] [li]... actually everything is made for easy usage but still being decent[/li] [li]Rewritten dying handling[/li] [li]My global object system that has been released as a tutorial, you can read up about it there[/li] [li]fighpits and jad minigames written from scratch[/li] [li]All skills written with the eye on how it was on 05-06 rsps's[/li] [li]Runs on grahams event manager[/li] [li]Prayer handling written from scratch[/li] [li]NPC handling system written from scratch (extreme easy design for adding, yelling, aggresivity, new npcs ect... everything..[/li] [li]PvN & PvP written from scratch[/li][/ul] [b][size=18pt]Media:[/size][/b] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/CrN1k.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/XVrGB.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/XKYcw.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/2VPxD.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/YRivr.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/uMSRf.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ooExV.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/7z8sY.png[/img] [b][size=18pt]Notes:[/size][/b] - There are barely npc spawned, shops and no training area or population of cities. ^ For the simple reason that this was NOT meant to be a server ready to host, BUT a clean server where you can make from what you want with a decent base. - It's possible that some content will still contain bugs or are not completely finished, since I never hosted this for public and tested everything alone. - Though you will see a lot of recognition with delta, this is not a delta anymore, c&p tutorials will not turn out for you, know this before you start pming with your errors. - All bugs you find you can pm me, I will help you to fix them, ofc only if its a part of my content. [b][size=16pt]Credits:[/size][/b] - Me for programming this server - Team Rocket for [b]support[/b], inspiration and a hand of help - Lostmyphat for a hand of help (though you got more than enough back from me trolo) - Delta & Spades for the absolute starting base [b][size=16pt]Links:[/size][/b] [b]Source download:[/b] [url=http://up.ht/NzVoXZ]http://up.ht/NzVoXZ[/url] Some clients that should work: [url=http://up.ht/NzXg36]http://up.ht/NzXg36[/url] (377 with a bunch of customs and 269 hitsplats or something) [url=http://up.ht/NzXdUW]http://up.ht/NzXdUW[/url] (377 clean with added music system) [url=http://up.ht/NzXdV0]http://up.ht/NzXdV0[/url] (474+)[/quote] Once you get this, you wonder
Omg. No run.bat...
I am here to fix that. Project Zeta, in my opinion, elevates Delta to a whole new level. For those who can't use it, you need at IDE to use it.
An integrated development environment (IDE) is a software application that provides comprehensive facilities to computer programmers for software development. An IDE normally consists of: [ul][li]a source code editor[/li] [li]build automation tools[/li] [li]a debugger[/li][/ul]
This teaches you have to open Project Zeta from the IDE known as eclipse. It is very simple, plus eclipse helps you catch many errors and also provides fixes for them! To start, go to http://www.eclipse.org/downloads/. You should see Eclipse IDE for Java Developers, download that. [img]http://img256.imageshack.us/img256/4449/eclipse1w.png[/img] Image from Mendorphins The installation instructions are simple and straightforward. Once you load eclipse, close the welcome screen. [img]http://img688.imageshack.us/img688/2677/closeeclip.png[/img] Image from Mendorphins Now you wanna start a new Java Project do it like this: [URL=http://img195.imageshack.us/i/eclipsepa.gif/][IMG]http://img195.imageshack.us/img195/6996/eclipsepa.gif[/img][/URL] In Project Name, type your project's name. Then click Finish. [URL=http://img221.imageshack.us/i/fgggn.png/][IMG]http://img221.imageshack.us/img221/5396/fgggn.png[/img][/URL] Now in the location you put the project folder in, open that folder. [URL=http://img585.imageshack.us/i/ad3wq.png/][IMG]http://img585.imageshack.us/img585/994/ad3wq.png[/img][/URL] Delete EVERYTHING in it. [URL=http://img443.imageshack.us/i/gsss.png/][IMG]http://img443.imageshack.us/img443/1485/gsss.png[/img][/URL] Once that's done, Add the Project Zeta files. [URL=http://img689.imageshack.us/i/82237047.png/][IMG]http://img689.imageshack.us/img689/2043/82237047.png[/img][/URL] Now refresh the folder in Eclipse. [URL=http://img339.imageshack.us/i/fwaa.png/][IMG]http://img339.imageshack.us/img339/7623/fwaa.png[/img][/URL] And your files are there :). [URL=http://img338.imageshack.us/i/fdff.png/][IMG]http://img338.imageshack.us/img338/3973/fdff.png[/img][/URL] Done! Any questions post here! [size=36pt]For more help...[/size] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=F9PW7jt-wlc

I’m off to sleep all. Peace[/quote]

item.title: [Project Zeta]How to use/open Project Zeta ~ Video's UP! ~
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“Ian1045, post:13, topic:455424”][quote author=arham 4 link=topic=558325.msg4089718#msg4089718 date=1346205699]

Nice tut man, I now have all the files there, but how do I run them into a server I can play on?

Right click on your project name > run as > java application >
you’ll have a few options of filenames, chose “Server”
Then your server will run, as long as you don’t remove your project out of eclipse you only have to do this once.
You can us the green play button after that and it will automatically run.
Eclipse also auto-compiles so you don’t have to bother about that either

Error: Could not find the main class: org.randqm.server Program will exit Keep getting errors whenever I try to do anything involving RSPS’s starting to get really aggravated!

Don’t worry, I’m uploading a video. Almost done

You’re literally the best!

Aww. The real credits are to RandQm. I just help him by making tutorials, it’s the most I can do :o.

EDIT: Video’s up!


[/quote]

You and Rand are the greatest! Testing now![/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: [Project Zeta]How to use/open Project Zeta ~ Video's UP! ~
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“RandQm, post:1, topic:453305”][center]

[size=24pt]Introduction:[/size]
[b]I once started a project with the eye on improving delta,
many months later, there has been so much changed that it just can’t be called a delta anymore.
Apart from the main design everything has been rewritten from scratch.
I’m still working on this project, but I decided to make a small project and release it to the public.
The idea for this server was using my own base for the biggest part,
keeping it as noobfriendly as possible and keeping it clean, ready to be made a good server from.

For this release I tried to bring back oldschool rsps skilling, which wasn’t hard since everything was so basic.[/b]
[/center]

[size=18pt]Project Zeta:[/size]

[ul][li]Packaged[/li]
[li]Everything extremely organized[/li]
[li]A lot of information blocks[/li]
[li]Cleaned from all unnused content[/li]
[li]Nutrition (pots & food)[/li]
[li]Basic npc clipping[/li]
[li]Worldwide all pickables[/li]
[li]Boat traveling system[/li]
[li]New shop adding system from scratch; extremely easy usage[/li]
[li]New stair handling system from scratch; extremely easy usage[/li]
[li]New unique dialogue handling system from scratch; extremely easy usage[/li]
[li]… actually everything is made for easy usage but still being decent[/li]
[li]Rewritten dying handling[/li]
[li]My global object system that has been released as a tutorial, you can read up about it there[/li]
[li]fighpits and jad minigames written from scratch[/li]
[li]All skills written with the eye on how it was on 05-06 rsps’s[/li]
[li]Runs on grahams event manager[/li]
[li]Prayer handling written from scratch[/li]
[li]NPC handling system written from scratch (extreme easy design for adding, yelling, aggresivity, new npcs ect… everything…[/li]
[li]PvN & PvP written from scratch[/li][/ul]

[size=18pt]Media:[/size]

CrN1k.png784×540

XVrGB.png784×540

XKYcw.png783×540

2VPxD.png734×425

[size=18pt]Notes:[/size]

  • There are barely npc spawned, shops and no training area or population of cities.
    ^ For the simple reason that this was NOT meant to be a server ready to host,
    BUT a clean server where you can make from what you want with a decent base.
  • It’s possible that some content will still contain bugs or are not completely finished,
    since I never hosted this for public and tested everything alone.
  • Though you will see a lot of recognition with delta, this is not a delta anymore,
    c&p tutorials will not turn out for you, know this before you start pming with your errors.
  • All bugs you find you can pm me, I will help you to fix them, ofc only if its a part of my content.

[size=16pt]Credits:[/size]

  • Me for programming this server
  • Team Rocket for support, inspiration and a hand of help
  • Lostmyphat for a hand of help (though you got more than enough back from me trolo)
  • Delta & Spades for the absolute starting base

[size=16pt]Links:[/size]

Source download:
http://up.ht/NzVoXZ

Some clients that should work:
http://up.ht/NzXg36 (377 with a bunch of customs and 269 hitsplats or something)
http://up.ht/NzXdUW (377 clean with added music system)
http://up.ht/NzXdV0 (474+)[/quote]

Once you get this, you wonder

Omg. No run.bat...

I am here to fix that.

Project Zeta, in my opinion, elevates Delta to a whole new level. For those who can’t use it, you need at IDE to use it.

An integrated development environment (IDE) is a software application that provides comprehensive facilities to computer programmers for software development. An IDE normally consists of:

[ul][li]a source code editor[/li]
[li]build automation tools[/li]
[li]a debugger[/li][/ul]

This teaches you have to open Project Zeta from the IDE known as eclipse. It is very simple, plus eclipse helps you catch many errors and also provides fixes for them!

To start, go to http://www.eclipse.org/downloads/. You should see Eclipse IDE for Java Developers, download that.


Image from Mendorphins

The installation instructions are simple and straightforward. Once you load eclipse, close the welcome screen.


Image from Mendorphins

Now you wanna start a new Java Project do it like this:

In Project Name, type your project’s name. Then click Finish.

Now in the location you put the project folder in, open that folder.

Delete EVERYTHING in it.

Once that’s done, Add the Project Zeta files.

Now refresh the folder in Eclipse.

And your files are there :).

Done! Any questions post here!

[size=36pt]For more help…[/size]

Read full topic
item.source: [Project Zeta]How to use/open Project Zeta ~ Video's UP! ~
